category.name: Administration.eIntegrator
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EINT_create_new_forms
preference.preference_description: Determines whether or not to create a new form when importing external data. If left unset, create a new form for the imported data. Valid Values: 0 - Updates the existing form with the imported data if found by the given name. If not found, create a new form for the imported data. 1 - Always creates a new form when importing external data.
